invocations.description: Moves your character in the specified direction. direction can be: 'n', 'e', 's', 'w', 'ne', 'se', 'sw' or 'nw'.
invocations.ex:
auto(100)
if not $inpz and paround(9) > 0 then
	move('s') wait(300,500)
end
invocations.exDescription: Each 100 milliseconds, it will check if there's a player on screen and you are not inside a protection zone yet. If so, it will move to the south.
